[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@secured-finance/lib-base](./lib-base.md) &gt; [MINIMUM\_DEBT](./lib-base.minimum_debt.md)

## MINIMUM\_DEBT variable

A Trove must always have at least this much debt.

**Signature:**

```typescript
MINIMUM_DEBT: Decimal
```

## Remarks

Any transaction that would result in a Trove with less debt than this will be reverted.
